{{Infobox Broadcast | call_letters = DXWP-TV (PTV-5 General Santos)| station_logo = <!-- Do NOT place a non-free image here without complying with WP:NFCC #10c -->| station_slogan = People's Television| station_branding = ''PTV-5 General Santos''| analog = 5 ([[VHF]])| digital = | affiliations = [[People's Television Network]]| founded = December 31, 1985| location = [[General Santos City]]| owner = [[People's Television Network|People's Television Network, Inc.]]| callsign_meaning = DXWP| former_affiliations = [[GMA Network]] (1985-1998)| former_callsigns = DXBB-TV (1985-1998)| effective_radiated_power = 1 kilowatt| homepage = [http://www.ptni.tv/ People's Television Network]| }} '''DXWP-TV''', channel 5, is a television station of [[Philippines|Philippine]] [[television network]] [[People's Television Network]]. Its studio and transmitter facility is located at Pioneer Avenue, General Santos City.
==See also== *[[People's Television Network]]
